title: Thomas McCraw on Schumpeter, Innovation, and Creative Destruction
description: Thomas McCraw of Harvard University talks about the ideas of Joseph Schumpeter from his book, Prophet of Innovation: Joseph Schumpeter and Creative Destruction. McCraw and EconTalk host Russ Roberts discuss innovation, business strategy, the role of mathematics in economics, and Schumpeter's vision of competition embodied in his most important idea--creative destruction.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
